events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit properly and the color is different from what was shown online.
The customer's request for a refund due to dissatisfaction with size and color issues was identified and categorized as a Refund case.
The case has been assigned to customer service representative Sarah M. to assist with the refund process and further communication.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with the refund for your jacket. Could you please provide your order number?
To begin processing your refund, may I also ask why you'd like to return the item? Any details you provide will help us improve.
Thank you. The jacket is too small despite ordering my usual size, and the color looks much darker than in the photos on your website.
We apologize for the inconvenience. We can initiate a full refund upon receipt of the returned jacket. I'll send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick help. I appreciate you sending the shipping label and look forward to completing the refund process soon.
The refund has been processed successfully after we received the returned jacket. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Since the refund was processed and no further issues have been reported, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support team.
